original_title: Dizzy Gillespie: Live at the Royal Festival Hall
overview: In this concert, recorded live Londonâ€™s Royal Festival Hall in 1989, Dizzy Gillespie performs with the magical United Nation Orchestra and a selection of jazz musicians including Slide Hampton, Arturo Sandoval, Paquito D'Rivera, Mario Rivera and Flora Purim.
title: Dizzy Gillespie: Live at the Royal Festival Hall
